thread.section_title: FloraQueen opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre FloraQueen | www.floraqueen.com
thread.title: richard parton

author: richard parton
title: richard parton
text: The flowers were not delivered and, when I try to log into the website it wont allow it, i've tried using their contact form to complain, but had no reply in several days now. I can only assume they have gone bankrupt as this is what companies do in these situations. I will be chasing up a refund via my credit card. Floraqueen you are terrible I will make sure everyone knows of my experience.
